text: Jose Garcia Villa (5 August 1908 – 7 February 1997) was a Filipino poet and writer. He is known for his pen name "Doveglion" (a combination of the words dove, eagle, and lion). == Works == Villa had a strong influence in the Philippines although he lived most of his life in the United States. He was awarded National Artist for Literature in 1973. === Major Works === * Have Come, Am Here * Footnote to Youth * Many Voices * Mir-i-nisa == References == Category:Filipino poets Category:Writers from Manila Category:1908 births Category:1997 deaths
title: José García Villa
